title: Forever101
author: Forever101
content: As new government enter now, we pray make bad belle people no give am wrong advice on bitcoins ooo, if not we go hit another rock for Bitcoin matter for naija. People wey no like bitcoins make them no rish the position of special advicer to the president. Make we just get ready and full of prayer oooo.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: We too like prayer. Everything nai be fasting and prayer? The previous government been no dey bitcoin friendly but still that one no stop us from doing our thing if this government won still misbehave e no go still fit stop us Nigerians go always find a way. Tinubu been don talk during him campaign rally say e get plan for the youth and bitcoin and blockchain na one of the projects way he go look into. Him boy sanwo-olu dey show positive signs say this people don realize say them no go fit separate bitcoin from the people.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: If regulation comes, taxing will follow. But the CBN said they kicked out bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. No regulation no tax, but Nigerians are really making P2P crypto transactions daily. I can see how the governments of one of the most populous countries are very wise. Or should we say no regulation brings freedom to Nigerians.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: I might be absolutely wrong, but I have tried to study the past government of Nigeria and how they have reacted to cryptocurrency, and I see that it's not really the first thing they looked at when a new president enters the presidential seat, so not in a rush, they will not even react to Bitcoin at the moment, and by the way, if someone gives bad advice to the president towards cryptocurrency, what do you think it will be? Despite whatever the regulation is, bitcoiners are still going to be doing their P2P.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: No be every something pray, any small tin pray, nah everything prayer dy solve? D way me self dy see things 4 diz we countri eh no really bad say diz government go get any interest via say dem wan do anything to Bitcoin or any crypto. Watin dem wan do way bad pass the one way dem been don already do, way dem just make things easy for us to they buga. Me self I no even they part of the people way dy say make diz government legalize Bitcoin make we use am for payment too, the way crypto stuff they 4 the countri dy me okay, make dem just allow us do our things nothing more, b4 dem go say make we begin dy pay task for something way dem no they contribute 4 d growth or how we they carry get am. Anything way make government choke eye 4 crypto again, way dem way say we dy free to use am freely. The upper year budget onah go see something like "1 billion to be gotten from Bitcoin and other digital assets" the tax seizure and collection go way us, if eh no affect people like me and u, eh go affect firms way dy operate 4 d countri.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: Nigeria government no even send crypto or put am for their agenda because them no see am as bad thing. Na only if one man dey for position wey he see say him fit use him power do something for e selfish reason na him e go take advantage. Remember say na CBN Governor na e use him power put ban for crypto no be federal government,na e make the crypto matter no serious for Naija. Any new president wey enter seat na how to first open office wet he go dey use thief money for himself na him e dey target. So how he won use crypto thief money. For me,I no think say Naija government get any issue with using crypto because so many boys wet dey street dey into crypto. Prayer na everything but we too need to help ourselves before the prayer go work. Imagine arm robber wet dey go rob and he kills in the process of robbing,when he won go rob,he come dey pray for successful robbery. The robber dey play,just dey play

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on June 04, 2023, 07:46:55 AMIf regulation comes, taxing will follow. But the CBN said they kicked out bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. No regulation no tax, but Nigerians are really making P2P crypto transactions daily. I can see how the governments of one of the most populous countries are very wise. Or should we say no regulation brings freedom to Nigerians. Yessoo me I dey use that option of p2p very well. Sometimes I dey sell give people I know and also buy from them as well. Prayer to crypto? Op you make me laf oo. Though nothing is impossible. But as it is the government e no get interest on crypto matters. There are some prayers you render that God will not answer too. No be the new government go bring out the crypto related matter dem. Na the Minister of Technology. Dat is why make God put someone who knows Cryptocurrencies. So dat the implementation of cryptocurrency in di kwantri go dey faster than before. If the minister is good then everything go dey stew and marama

comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on June 03, 2023, 07:45:26 PMAs new government enter now, we pray make bad belle people no give am wrong advice on bitcoins ooo, if not we go hit another rock for Bitcoin matter for naija. Make we just get ready and full of prayer oooo.I don’t really know but in as much as the government has not accepted the use of bitcoin and we still get to use it on a daily basis and most of us are earning a living from it makes me feel comfortable with it like that. I don’t know if there are other benefits that comes with it if government decides to accept its use in the nation. What I fear most after its acceptance is the regularisation which will follow up with tasks. Nigerians sometimes are not too friendly with collecting task. Especially now that it’s about bitcoin which they know the huge benefits on it, they can just put overzealous price in them and we don’t have choice than to pay.

comments.author: Kelward
comments.body: Prayer de important for anything wey we de do for dis life, but sometimes after di prayer, tins go still de go wrong. So wetin I believe be say God, don give us wisdom, so e depend on everybodi to use im oun knowledge for good or bad. So whether naija government go unban bitcoin go depend on whether dem think say e go favor dem government and pocket or not.But my observation so far  for dis discussion be say members no send if the government ban or unban bitcoin, because he no affect dem trading and profits. Also because of tax matter.

comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on June 03, 2023, 07:45:26 PMSnippedSomethings need no prayer at all, do we actually needs prayer for the government to adopt bitcoin as a legal tender, we the leadership realized that what the people want is financial freedom but they don't want to allow it, aren't we the problems to the current status of what we are facing today, this may not apllies to Nigeria alone but every part of the world is concerned, it's all about our individual selfish ambitions and interests which requires no prayer because we know ourselves and those involved.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.created_time: June 20, 2023, 08:51:46 AMLast edit: June 20, 2023, 09:33:23 AM by CryptSafe
comments.body: OP, this is technology and it has to do with, awareness, acceptance and  adoption. It is not about going spiritual everytime but of knowledge and Understanding. If these people are properly educated and knowledgeable enough about bitcoin, they would not be commiting some blunders they do. Come to talk of it, most of them are old school not near anything modern innovation and technology as this was the case of the previous government and it affected the Crypto market industry in Nigeria but however, we believe this incumbent government has much bigger and better plans for Crypto/Blockchain in Nigeria and we hope that the president gets a good adviser with more exposure and broad knowledge and Understanding of the tech world so as to educate Mr President good ideas and advise to work with in respect to Crypto.
